verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the desert <S%H4057><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%> As whirlwinds <S%H5492><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%> pass <S%H2498><s%> through; so it comes <S%H935><s%> from the desert, <S%H4057><s%> from a terrible <S%H3372><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

A grievous <S%H7186><s%> vision <S%H2380><s%> is declared <S%H5046><s%> to me; the treacherous <S%H898><s%> dealer deals <S%H6213><s%> treacherously, <S%H898><s%> and the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> spoils. <S%H7703><s%> Go <S%H5927><s%> up, O Elam: <S%H5867><s%> besiege, <S%H6696><s%> O Media; <S%H4074><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sighing <S%H585><s%> thereof have I made to cease. <S%H7673><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> are my loins <S%H4975><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with pain: <S%H2479><s%> pangs <S%H6735><s%> have taken <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on me, as the pangs <S%H6735><s%> of a woman that travails: <S%H3205><s%> I was bowed <S%H5791><s%> down at the hearing <S%H8085><s%> of it; I was dismayed <S%H926><s%> at the seeing <S%H7200><s%> of it.

My heart <S%H3824><s%> panted, <S%H8582><s%> fearfulness <S%H6427><s%> affrighted <S%H1204><s%> me: the night <S%H5399><s%> of my pleasure <S%H2837><s%> has he turned <S%H7760><s%> into fear <S%H2731><s%> to me.

Prepare <S%H6186><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> in the watchtower, <S%H6844><s%> eat, <S%H398><s%> drink: <S%H8354><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> you princes, <S%H8269><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the shield. <S%H4043><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> has the LORD <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Go, <S%H3212><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> a watchman, <S%H6822><s%> let him declare <S%H5046><s%> what <S%H834><s%> he sees. <S%H7200><s%>

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> a chariot <S%H7393><s%> with a couple <S%H6776><s%> of horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of asses, <S%H2543><s%> and a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of camels; <S%H1581><s%> and he listened <S%H7181><s%> diligently <S%H7182><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> heed: <S%H7182><s%>

And he cried, <S%H7121><s%> A lion: <S%H738><s%> My lord, <S%H136><s%> I stand <S%H5975><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> on the watchtower <S%H4707><s%> in the daytime, <S%H3119><s%> and I am set <S%H5324><s%> in my ward <S%H4931><s%> whole <S%H3605><s%> nights: <S%H3915><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> here <S%H2088><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of men, <S%H376><s%> with a couple <S%H6776><s%> of horsemen. <S%H6571><s%> And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Babylon <S%H894><s%> is fallen, <S%H5307><s%> is fallen; <S%H5307><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the graven <S%H6456><s%> images of her gods <S%H430><s%> he has broken <S%H7665><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

O my threshing, <S%H4098><s%> and the corn <S%H1121><s%> of my floor: <S%H1637><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> have I declared <S%H5046><s%> to you.

The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Dumah. <S%H1746><s%> He calls <S%H7121><s%> to me out of Seir, <S%H8165><s%> Watchman, <S%H8104><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> of the night? <S%H3915><s%> Watchman, <S%H8104><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> of the night? <S%H3915><s%>

The watchman <S%H8104><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The morning <S%H1242><s%> comes, <S%H857><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> the night: <S%H3915><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will inquire, <S%H1158><s%> inquire <S%H1158><s%> you: return, <S%H7725><s%> come. <S%H857><s%>

The burden <S%H4853><s%> on Arabia. <S%H6152><s%> In the forest <S%H3293><s%> in Arabia <S%H6152><s%> shall you lodge, <S%H3885><s%> O you traveling <S%H736><s%> companies <S%H736><s%> of Dedanim. <S%H1720><s%>

The inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tema <S%H8485><s%> brought <S%H857><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to him that was thirsty, <S%H6771><s%> they prevented <S%H6923><s%> with their bread <S%H3899><s%> him that fled. <S%H5074><s%>

For they fled <S%H5074><s%> from the swords, <S%H2719><s%> from the drawn <S%H5203><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> and from the bent <S%H1869><s%> bow, <S%H7198><s%> and from the grievousness <S%H3514><s%> of war. <S%H4421><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> has the LORD <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Within <S%H5750><s%> a year, <S%H8141><s%> according to the years <S%H8141><s%> of an hireling, <S%H7916><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall fail: <S%H3615><s%>

And the residue <S%H7605><s%> of the number <S%H4557><s%> of archers, <S%H7198><s%> the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kedar, <S%H6938><s%> shall be diminished: <S%H4591><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.
